text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to deal with backstabbers?
text.Response A: Sure, here’s some advice for dealing with backstabbers:  don’t let them get to you, don’t give them the satisfaction of reacting to their behavior, and just try to ignore them.  It can be really hard to deal with backstabbers, but just try to focus on your own positive qualities and actions, and don’t let these people get to you.  And if you do find yourself getting upset or angry in response to their behavior, try to let it go and just move on.
text.Response B: Themes are design layouts for the tumblr blog publishing platform.  You can browse a catalog of available themes on the tumblr website.  You can also purchase premium themes from third party developers.  If you have specific questions about the available options, you can consult the tumblr help documentation.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

758.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to deal with backstabbers?

Response A

Sure, here’s some advice for dealing with backstabbers: don’t let them get to you, don’t give them the satisfaction of reacting to their behavior, and just try to ignore them. It can be really hard to deal with backstabbers, but just try to focus on your own positive qualities and actions, and don’t let these people get to you. And if you do find yourself getting upset or angry in response to their behavior, try to let it go and just move on.

Response B

Themes are design layouts for the tumblr blog publishing platform. You can browse a catalog of available themes on the tumblr website. You can also purchase premium themes from third party developers. If you have specific questions about the available options, you can consult the tumblr help documentation.
